name: Kevin B.
alt: Kevin B. shows off his new Manzanita hardtail.
text: The short story is in my 30 years of mountain biking this is the best bike I've ever owned.

name: Amiel S.
alt: Amiel riding his hardtail in California
text: The bike is sooo comfortable! It's the most compliant hardtail that I've ever ridden.

name: Carlos B.
alt: Carlos riding his hardtail in the Alps.
text: The final feeling when you get to ride the bike is pure satisfaction...

name: Max E.
alt: Yellow gravel bike viewing San Francisco fog.
text: Nick was able to deliver hands down the most fun drop bar bike I've ever ridden.

name: Gavin B.
alt: Max carves a corner on his gravel bike.
text: The bike is comfortable - back tightness that plagued me in the past has disappeared and the bike handles great!

name: Charlie P.
text: The bike has been a dream since I received it a couple months ago and would recommend him to anyone who will listen!

name: Elliot
alt: Elliot riding his Manzanita to a 7th place finish at the 2025 Stetina's Paydirt.

name: Miguel
alt: Miguel riding to a 10th place finish at the 2025 Lost and Found Gravel Race.

name: Ward
alt: Ward's Whippet on a training ride in Washington.

name: Andrew N.
text: I can say without hesitation it handles and feels better than any bike I've had before.

name: McCord B.
text: My new Manzanita is not only prettier than I could have ever imagined, but also rides like a dream!

name: Collin W.
alt: Collin rides down a granite slab on his hardcore hardtail.
text: The only drawback to ordering a Manzanita is that you will soon want a stable of them.
